root.title: commerc bancorp coba file offer
root.body: commerc bancorp inc say file registr statement secur exchang commiss 575,000 share seri b cumul prefer stock offer includ 75,000 share cover allot commerc say bank subsidiari use proce support plan growth gener corpor purpos bank hold compani say share prefer stock initi convert one share commerc common stock commerc say prefer share price rang 20-22 dlr share propos sale public commenc early-to-mid april commerc say butcher singer inc offer manag underwrit
